column4: Uh, quick question. Whats the difference between Unix and Linux? I'm looking at a list of software and what OS
's they are for, but I don't really know what Unix is :P excuse my accidental enter key btw
Unix was and still is a commercial OS developed by AT&T. Linux is a unix-like OS but no lineage to it. FreeBSD or NetBSD et al are more of a Unix heritage
